Ubuntu has a certification system for third party software.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ubuntu.com/partners/softwareprogramme |title=Partners/certification/software |publisher=Canonical |accessdate=16 March 2006}}</ref> Some third-party software that does not limit distribution is included in Ubuntu's multiverse component. The package ''[[ubuntu-restricted-extras]]'' additionally contains software that may be legally restricted, including support for [[MP3]] and [[DVD-Video|DVD]] playback, [[mscorefonts|Microsoft TrueType core fonts]], [[Sun Microsystems|Sun's]] [[Java Virtual Machine|Java runtime environment]], [[Adobe Systems|Adobe's]] [[Adobe Flash Player|Flash Player]] plugin, many common audio/video [[codec]]s, and unrar, an unarchiver for files [[Data compression|compressed]] in the [[RAR (file format)|RAR file format]].
Ubuntu has a certification system for third party software.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ubuntu.com/partners/softwareprogramme |title=Partners/certification/software |publisher=Canonical |accessdate=16 March 2006}}</ref> Some third-party software that does not limit distribution is included in Ubuntu's multiverse component. The package ''[[ubuntu-restricted-extras]]'' additionally contains software that may be legally restricted, including support for [[MP3]] and [[DVD-Video|DVD]] playback, [[mscorefonts|Microsoft TrueType core fonts]], [[Sun Microsystems|Sun's]] [[Java Virtual Machine|Java runtime environment]], [[Adobe Systems|Adobe's]] [[Adobe Flash Player|Flash Player]] plugin, many common audio/video [[codec]]s, and unrar, an unarchiver for files [[Data compression|compressed]] in the [[RAR (file format)|RAR file format]].
â
Additionally, third party application suites are available for purchase through the Canonical web-based store,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://shop.canonical.com/index.php?cPath=19 |title=Canonical Store |publisher=Shop.canonical.com |date= |accessdate=2011-05-27}}</ref> including software for DVD playback and media codecs.
+
Additionally, third party application suites are available for purchase through the [[Canonical Ltd.|Canonical]] web-based store,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://shop.canonical.com/index.php?cPath=19 |title=Canonical Store |publisher=Shop.canonical.com |date= |accessdate=2011-05-27}}</ref> including software for DVD playback and media codecs.
